nav.div: Jefferson Central School » News » What's New » Closure Update

img.alt: This is the image for the news article titled Closure Update
img.title: This is the image for the news article titled Closure Update

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
div.span: New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo announced during his April 16 press briefing that New York state will remain “on pause” through May 15 to help mitigate the spread of COVID-19. The governor could extend the closure again if he feels it is necessary to contain the virus.

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
div.span: Our teachers have been in contact with students and their families to provide instruction and materials and will continue to do so throughout this extended closure in accordance with the district’s plan for continuing instruction.

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
div.span: The district’s food service department will continue to provide meals on Monday's and Wednesday's.

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
div.span: For those parents and guardians who are considered essential workers during this closure, please refer to the district website for more information.

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
div.span: We appreciate your patience and flexibility during this time. We know this is a challenging time for everyone. The district will continue to provide updates as more information becomes available on the school's website and through robocalls.

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.div:
1332 State Route 10, Jefferson, NY 12093
Phone 607-652-7821 | Fax 607-652-7806
